extendedInfo.description: ** Stock Charts and Indicators ** Get Technical Rankings for all S&P1500 Stocks  ** List Rankings by Range** Get Lists by Stock Screens** Add Screens to Favorites** Group Results by Industry** Twitter Feed** Access to Jchart Research** Email Stock Lists** Generates trading ideas** Helps to identify trends** Simple and intuitive** Easily add stocks to watch lists** S&P1500 covers approximately 90% of the U.S. market capitalization.** Over 200 industry groups** Follow us on twitter at @JchartUpdates--------------------------------------------------------Get quick rankings for S&P 1500 stocks.--------------------------------------------------------Rankings are based on multiple indicators including:Money Flow, MACD, Moving Averages, Point and Figure and more. ----------------------------------------Stock Screens for S&P 1500 stocks----------------------------------------End-of-day stock screens with multiple indicators.Stocks screen results are categorized by over 200 industry groups.Drill down on industry group for stock lists. Add stocks to your personal lists.----------------------------------------Manage your stock lists.----------------------------------------Create buy, sell, and watch stock lists. Lists show '% positive ranking' for each stock.Drill down on stocks in your list to the view indicators that make up the ranking.Get more info links out to external web resources.Click on stock from screen of ranking results and add to your list.----------------------------------------User's Guide----------------------------------------In the main screen, you are presented with four button choices:[Screens][Ranking][Chart][My Lists][Jchart Research] [Tweets] [Screens]Lists all of indicators and the number of stocks that pass each indicator.Drilling down categorized stocks by industry group. Groups with higher number of stocks are listed first.Drilling down on a group will list stocks and there rankings.Long press a stock gives five choices:1. get ranking details2. get more info from external resources3-5. add to your personal Long, Short or Watch stock listAllows you to browse stocks based on screen and industry group and add to your personal lists.[Enter Stock - Get Rankings]Enter a stock to view stocks ranking and indicators that make up the ranking.[My Lists]Create your own Buy, Sell, and Watch lists.Long press tabs [Long] [Short] [Watch] to: 1. Add tickers2. Delete all tickersLong press a stock in the list to:1. Get Ranking details for the stock2. Get more info on the stock from external resources3. Delete the stock [Ranking]1. Enter a stock to get a Technical Ranking. The stock must be in the S&P1500.2. List Groups/Stocks by ranking range. 0% - 19% Positive20% - 39% Positive40% - 59% Positive60% - 79% Positive80% - 100% PositiveThe system updates nightly and will between 10:30PM and 11:30 PM ESTThere are no advertisements.Technical Support Contact:android.support@jchart.com Disclaimer: We are not be liable for any errors or any actions taken in based on the provided information in the Jchart android app.

reviews.title: Grood technical screener
reviews.comment: The charts do not fit properly but the software scans pretty well.  Aa of july 22nd 2013 the charts dont fit well on galaxy s4 .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sweet application that uses great technical analysis. Needs otc:bb in its search and a comparison between the strategies in rankings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I will rate it 5 stars if it can save a default template ps thx for adding default chart setting. Can you make the list exportable ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good scan
reviews.comment: It gives you a lot of technical analysis ideas.
reviews.author: Prasanna Chari
